ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 568
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well, some of the posted lists were disgustingly good, if you ask me. As a semi-twink, I was getting cocky.  Took me down a peg. Skull Shaped Barbute,
ygData.messageBody:
> >Hiya all,
> >
> >I thought I'd start this post because it's good to
> >see what other bards
> >have got inventory wise so that I know what to aim
> >for......
> >

Well, some of the posted lists were disgustingly good, if you ask me.
As a semi-twink, I was getting cocky. Took me down a peg.

Skull Shaped Barbute, Executioner's Hood (depending on situation)
Two +3 Str Earrings
Bronze Mask
Spiked Collar
Lambent Arms
Bronze Gauntlets
Serpentine Bracer
Silver-Plated Bracer
Two +7 Dex +5 Chr rings
Crested Pauldron
Charred Guardian BP, Steel BP (depending on looks)
Lambent Boots
Bronze Cape
Troll Hide Belt
Silver-Plated Leggings

Runed Falchion
Tainted Tier'Dal Rapier
Throwing Knives

Mistmoore Drums
Mino Horn
Mandolin, Brass Horn

Evil Eye Bag

Four assorted (unpaired) lambent armor components
One Lambent Ruby, one Lambent Star Ruby, 2 Star Rubies, 6 Fire Opals
450pp
A bank vault completely full of assorted trade junk

Note: you can have one of each Lambent [insert gem name here], which
lets you accumulate lambent stones earlier than right when you need them,
but you can only have ONE of each. They are LORE, which I noticed to my
chagrin when two star rubies and a lambent stone vanished upon my hitting
the "give" button. Sigh.

Kenross Cantorforjado, 35 songs, Innoruuk

PS - You Innoruuk Bards with the Platinum Ruby Veils and the Golden Black
Pearl Chokers (you know who you are, Sylly and Harmonic) - who makes
them? How much should I expect to pay? Where do I go to find a Black
Pearl?
